sources.title: Mackenna's Gold (1969) Gregory Peck Â· Omar Sharif
sources.description: A marshal falls into the hands of a bandit and is forced to lead him to secret gold caches. Just as they reach their destination, an earthquake destroys the area. A thrilling western set against a magnificent natural backdrop.

metadata.Plot: The gangster Colorado kidnaps Marshal McKenna. He believes that McKenna has seen a map which leads to a rich vein of gold in the mountains and forces him to show him the way. But they're not the only ones who are after the gold, soon they meet a group of "honorable" citizens and the cavalry crosses their way too, and that is even before they enter Indian territory.
metadata.Actors: Gregory Peck, Omar Sharif, Telly Savalas
